statements: SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT item_name, quantity, procurement_date FROM inventory ORDER BY procurement_date DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE item_id = 3;
SELECT item_id, supplier_id, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY procurement_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT item_name, quantity, supplier_id FROM inventory WHERE supplier_id = 3 ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT item_id, item_name FROM inventory WHERE quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 10 ORDER BY item_id;
SELECT item_id, item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity < 5 ORDER BY item_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE supplier_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND procurement_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY supplier_id, item_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels WHERE location='Main Warehouse';
SELECT product_id, quantity FROM inventory_levels WHERE quantity > 50;
SELECT supplier_name, address FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 3;
SELECT product_id, location, quantity FROM inventory_levels WHERE location='Retail Store' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE address LIKE '%street%' ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT location, quantity FROM inventory_levels WHERE quantity < 5 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, address, phone_number FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name;
SELECT location, quantity, product_id FROM inventory_levels WHERE location LIKE '%Warehouse%' ORDER BY quantity DESC, product_id ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, phone_number FROM suppliers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory_levels ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT location, product_name FROM inventory_levels WHERE quantity < 10;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_name, contact_email FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, order_date FROM suppliers JOIN procurement_records ON suppliers.supplier_id = procurement_records.supplier_id ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels WHERE quantity > 50 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, location FROM inventory_levels JOIN suppliers ON inventory_levels.id = suppliers.supplier_id;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id IN (SELECT supplier_id FROM procurement_records WHERE quantity_ordered > 100);

SELECT inventory_levels.product_name, procurement_records.quantity_ordered FROM inventory_levels JOIN procurement_records ON inventory_levels.id = procurement_records.product_id WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';

SELECT supplier_name, SUM(quantity_ordered) AS total_ordered FROM suppliers JOIN procurement_records ON suppliers.supplier_id = procurement_records.supplier_id GROUP BY supplier_name ORDER BY total_ordered DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT id, supplier_name, email FROM suppliers;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory_levels WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT supplier_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM supply_chain_management GROUP BY supplier_name;
SELECT product_name, location FROM supply_chain_management WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels ORDER BY product_name DESC, quantity ASC
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory_levels WHERE quantity > 50
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Suppliers'
SELECT product_name, supplier_name, purchase_date FROM supply_chain_management WHERE location = 'Warehouse A'

SELECT inventory_levels.product_name, procurement_records.quantity, suppliers.supplier_name FROM procurement_records INNER JOIN inventory_levels ON procurement_records.product_id = inventory_levels.id INNER JOIN suppliers ON procurement_records.supplier_id = suppliers.id
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, phone_number FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM suppliers INNER JOIN procurement_records ON suppliers.supplier_id = procurement_records.supplier_id GROUP BY supplier_name;
SELECT product_name, supplier_name, purchase_date FROM inventory INNER JOIN procurement_records ON inventory.id = procurement_records.product_id ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, phone_number FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC
SELECT product_name, location FROM inventory WHERE location IN ('Warehouse A', 'Warehouse B')
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, phone_number FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE '%Corp%'
SELECT product_name, quantity, location FROM inventory INNER JOIN procurement_records ON inventory.id = procurement_records.product_id WHERE purchase_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY quantity DESC
